doc.field: Richard P. Hart letter to James Crombie
Richard P. Hart letter to James Crombie

Letter from Richard Philip Hart at Troy, New York, to James Crombie, at Fulton, New York, discussing the sale of crops, rental of farmland, the possible acquisition of buildings, and the proposed construction of a dam to provide water power. For fuller details about this item, and to request it for research, please read its catalog record, or write to reference@nyhistory.org.
